mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.main.model.dao.MainDAO#selectCommutingLog() */ A.COMMUTE_NO , A.YEAR_MONTH , A.DAY , A.IN_TIME , A.OUT_TIME , A.LATE_YN , A.LEAVE_EARLY_YN FROM TBL_COMMUTE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND (A.YEAR_MONTH || '-' || A.DAY) BETWEEN #{ weekStartDate } AND #{ weekEndDate }

SELECT /* com.qs.www.main.model.dao.MainDAO#selectWorkingLog() */ A.MEMBER_WORK_LOG_NO , A.WORK_TYPE , A.WORK_NO , A.CHANGE_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER_WORK_LOG A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
AND A.CHANGE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(B.CHANGE_DATE) FROM TBL_MEMBER_WORK_LOG B WHERE B.CHANGE_DATE <= #{ selectedDate })
